name: Dinner Tonight: Sopa de Ajo (Garlic Soup)
description: Why is garlic soup so satisfying? It's one of the simplest soups to make, and yet it comes out soothing and utterly calming. Some people have chicken soup; I prefer this stuff. Which isn't to say all are created equal.
recipeIngredient: 1/4 pound stale bread, crusts removed, cut into 1/2 inch cubes

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the olive oil into a pot. Turn the heat to medium-high and add the cubed bread. Cook for 5 minutes, stirring often, until the bread is lightly browned. Toss in the garlic, pimentón, and a pinch of salt. Stir well, and cook for 3 minutes.
Pour in the stock, bring to a boil, then reduce heat to a simmer. Cook for 15 minutes.
Ladle some soup into a bowl and top with a poached egg.
